participant_1.background:
I've been in my current relationship for five years, and it's the longest I've ever been with someone.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
i enjoy eating italian food.
i shop online a lot.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

participant_2.background:
I play the guitar to express the thoughts that my weird mind can't.
i m an amazing dancer.
i love to take my children on nature walks.
i own a hearse.
I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.

content.text: Hey! What's up? I'm so excited for the new season of Game of Thrones!
I know, right? It's been so long since the last season! I'm so curious about what's going to happen to all the characters.
Me too! I'm really worried about Jon Snow. I hope he makes it out alive!
I know, right? He's been through so much already. I'm sure he'll be okay though.
I hope you're right! What are you most looking forward to in the new season?
I'm really excited to see what happens with Daenerys and her dragons. I think they're going to be a major part of the story this season.
I know, right? They're so powerful! I can't wait to see what they do.
Me too! I think they're going to be the key to defeating the White Walkers.
That would be awesome! I can't wait to see what happens!
Me neither! It's going to be a great season!
I know, right? I can't wait!
Do you want to watch the premiere together?
That would be great! I'll bring the pizza!
Sounds good! I'll bring the beer!
